# unit-test-starter

Generate starter unit tests for a small function or module. Use when a junior developer needs test scaffolding and edge cases.

## Quick Facts
- id: `unit-test-starter--e45a526e39`
- worth_using_score: `30/100`
- source: `codex_skills`
- source_path: `/home/wolvend/.codex/skills/unit-test-starter/SKILL.md`

## Workflow / Steps
- Identify core behaviors and failure cases from the function signature.
- Propose table-driven cases with inputs and expected outputs.
- Highlight one edge case and one negative case.
- Show how to run the tests.
